parameters.url: ={{ (() => {     const cadencia = $item("0").$node["Fields Deal"].json["cadência"];          const urlMap = {         'vending-machine': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57696/lead?token=ANtLf6Pd9o9LeoWxSgNBaVArACy-auOChs3LZbBPD3-M',         'buffet-infantil': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57697/lead?token=bVG6S1EvHDrXq-udz1aUbAEmky1bmWYdpMYonU_j0pY',         'arcade': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57695/lead?token=NFvumvV2peJoyBoa5JS5Adsen8GktlPB914jx36QkF8',         'eventos': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57694/lead?token=IoQXw4ovE_4CSh59XBRmdEC4ZLZtNMXQzrrpOcYSc_M',         'estabelecimentos': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57693/lead?token=OHRqMdIrTjO2xZMg-8CVRbKFAbx4bMnzzeHkzwYxmCk',         'ebook-vm': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57684/lead?token=AK_yac8RThR9sOkDtKXWPJSvdxwgY1S6MGJf7moS5lZM',         'ebook-bi': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57687/lead?token=AtVHAS9SIYSxEM95biUAMXOgVoivM-ILGVfyWqs5RPQ',         'ebook-ar': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57688/lead?token=NxAPaYKwkMdaJBB8DdCGZ1If9rUuq649hy60Xhzrfzc',         'ebook-ev': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57689/lead?token=QIE-I2od68nv1RTvauSeCUhQraXkYNP97kD_YV3_5C4',         'ebook-es': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57691/lead?token=Vn6qAuq5qh1WNFoINMAgDGZu7sEPaUKigq83hCesEWI',         'out-arcade': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/57692/lead?token=Q-NdXga5wsu7JfN0sUtQJOu99hvVLN2OwNd4So5K-sA',         'out-buffet': 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/56484/lead?token=AN1gtrmL4o-N1Yyr47q940m7iKFxBBtJT57veRTO-ZN_'     };          // Fallback para quando estiver nulo ou não encontrado     const fallback = 'https://api.meetime.com.br/v2/prospections/cadence/56461/lead?token=LwDJOhLokK-wuvCa-TV0nNr81A5lTCsu2BYRYAq3iGg';          // Verifica se a cadência existe no mapa, se não usa o fallback     return urlMap[cadencia] || fallback; })() }}
